website_summaries.verdict: A unique twist on the original game that incorporates modern technology into the money exchanges.
pros: Play Monopoly like a modern-day banker with this version's touch-controlled banking unit, instant transactions, and property and rent values that rise and fall
cons: Some say it's not as fun as the original

customer_reviews.title: It is one of the best purchases I have made for my family
customer_reviews.text: I am a die hard classic Monopoly player, so I was a bit hesitant to purchase the Ultimate. It is one of the best purchases I have made for my family. We have played this almost every night since we got it a week or so ago. We love it!! Only wish more players could play at one time but other than that it's amazing!! The speed of this game gives you a chance to play multiple rounds. It's fast, fun and a nice change from the classic. Never thought I would ever say that!! Thanks for making our vacation that much more fun!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: Its a shamed, i bougth it for my son and it never works, the electronic unit doesnt recongnize the cards, and didnt make the sounds( car,plane, ship, helip) i did reset the unit, but it didnt work for me. Just the beep and a 0 appears, i placed the cards and it didnt do anything. So we have buy a bunch of pretty unuseful cards.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Tejeda

customer_reviews.title: A fun change but not as good as the original
customer_reviews.text: A lot of fun but very different from regular monopoly. Games are much faster and you dont have to think about how much money you have or buying houses. The game automatically does it for you. In regular monopoly you need to own all the same color to build but this moves your property up levels regardless of how many people own the same color properties. We find ourselves playing the original monopoly much more often than this.
customer_reviews.author: BEH

customer_reviews.title: Very fun and a great addition to regular Monopoly.
customer_reviews.text: It took us a little bit to get used to how this game works. But, once we figured it all out, it was really fun to play! It's different than your standard Monopoly. But, the game moves along faster and you don't have to keep track of your money and such. It's really pretty fun! It doesn't replace standard Monopoly. But, it's a great addition.
customer_reviews.author: H. KITE

customer_reviews.title: Bad Version Do Not Buy!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Hated this version!!! All the fun is lost when you have to futz around with the scanning device. We have played the other version with the credit cards but this one is different. The cards are cardboard and the game pieces are cheap plastic. There are only 4 game pieces which is weird. The scanning device screws up a lot which basically stops the game till you read the manual and try to solve the problem. Annoying. This version has no railroads or utilities either which is strange.The device ends the game for you which is not fun either. Basically a no go in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Crysta

customer_reviews.title: Would like traditional Monopoly with some of these rules to shorten timeframe.
customer_reviews.text: I can't decide if I like this or not. On one hand the game plays much faster than traditional Monopoly, but on the other hand when playing with younger kids it hard to avoid confusion having to do everything through the handheld device. I think I'd prefer these rules to shorten traditional monopoly but with a manual/human banker. This seems like a novelty that wore off quickly the third or forth time we had to try and undo something on the handheld. At one point it froze up on us and so the game was just over...
customer_reviews.author: BeccaMomof4

customer_reviews.title: NOT THIS ONE, KEEP SHOPPING
customer_reviews.text: Plastic pieces No railroads No community chest No chance Dont get to buy houses. The "bankers box" died after several laps round the board even though they were brand new batteries before we started playing this game for the first time, shut off resetting the entire game' and apparenrly for no reason because it turned back on with all of the game reset..... im returning this. Dont waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Regan

customer_reviews.title: Classic game with a new twist!
customer_reviews.text: Actually this is a nice edition, it is a good digital assistant when it comes to playing the part of the banker! It keeps track of many of the tasks which in previous versions were done manually. It makes a perfect gift as well! Classic game, new twist! PLEASE NOTE: If you appreciated this review please give it a “thumbs up/like” your helping me to continue to give honest/unbiased insight into products I’ve used and you may have questions about. Interested in a product but don't know enough about it and would like it reviewed? Please let me know and I'll see what I can do... Thank you 🙏
customer_reviews.author: Symbols Of LoveTop Contributor: Swimming

customer_reviews.title: nice but not the traditional game
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a smart game for my kid, although it is nice to play and faster than the old fashion game it have been losing most of its peculiarities regarding the concept of investments, market value, negotiations and growing a business. everything is managed by the electronic unit and leaves no room for negotiations, while the rent adds up every time somebody steps in your property instead of when you upgrade it investing money in it. Have been very upset once I found out all these changes that made it faster but at the same time useless for learning something.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: WASTED MONEY
customer_reviews.text: You are unable to know what money you have left in the card, also if you where mistakenly charged twice there is no way to turn back a transaction. It's like what I think buying bitcoins should have felt. Preffer the original and even better the jr versions. Totally not for little kids, WORST OF ALL YOU HAVE A LASER LIGHT COMING OUT FROM THE BANKING MACHINE POINTING YOUR EYES ALL THE GAME WHICH I SINCERELY BELIEVE MIGHT BE PERJUDICIAL FOR THE EYES NOT TO SAY FOR THE KIDS EYES. WASTED MONEY
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley

customer_reviews.title: Great family game!
customer_reviews.text: Was hesitant to buy this game...since I knew my kids would make me play it with them ;) it’s actually a really fun game for the whole family. Still mononolpy fun- but different and faster than the original. Very happy with purchase! Would buy again and recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Dhgems

customer_reviews.title: Neat Idea, Too Many Steps
customer_reviews.text: I originally thought I was buying the original electronic banking version of Monopoly, but this game uses various cards that have different scan images that are used to scan on the infrared little scanner box that comes with the game. It is confusing at first but a great idea. I think there is still some work that needs to be done to improve this version of the game because it should be quick and not as complicated when playing the game. It is very easy to forget to switch a player when scanning a card to play and it ruins the whole excitement of getting good and bad community chest/chance cards between players.
customer_reviews.author: Jay P.

customer_reviews.title: Great upgraded version of Monopoly!
customer_reviews.text: Con: No mathematical skills needed (or barely...) as the banking machine does all the calculations. Neat little machine with only three buttons, but with various combinations of keystrokes it does a lot more than I thought possible. Much faster game than the old classic monopoly, which is nice! Somehow, the board feels less cluttered, more straightforward. Sharp bright colors, bank machine working well, bank cards seem sturdy, playing cards averagely so. Overall great fun game, even my toddler loves feeding cards into the machine! Another con: the machine "talks" in beeps and sounds, and for the adult trying to get some thinking done in the same house, it gets annoying after a while!
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: took the fun out of it
customer_reviews.text: While my grandsons (aged 10 and 12) loved the game, I felt all the financial thinking was taken out of the game. The challenge of seeing cash accumulated. I never once looked at how much money I had in the automated machine because it would tell me when I was broke. In the "cash" Monopoly the fun was in watching the money and actually seeing yourself go broke. I am sure it is a generational thing since nowadays plastic money is the way to go and no one uses cash. Better to get Dave Ramsey's game which teaches a more financial side of things.
customer_reviews.author: Happy 1946

customer_reviews.title: We liked nothing about this version. Waste.
customer_reviews.text: This game is going straight into the garbage. We didn't like the modified rules, the "banking" machine was old fashioned and clunky. This may have been cool in 1995 but this is just silly. We really can't understand why this has such great reviews. The gameplay was never smooth because every 5 minutes, we were referring to the instructions: "How do we auction a property?" "How do we sell them?" Just get the original version.
customer_reviews.author: TiffanyNYC

customer_reviews.title: Fun. Quick. Does not replace traditional monopoly.
customer_reviews.text: The positive is that its a good twist on Monopoly that makes the game alot faster and is actually enjoyable with just 2 people. The bad is that the banking cards are cardboard, the pieces look cheap, and the whole game in total looks like a budget knockoff. As far as players who enjoy the traditional game which I count myself as one this will be fairly different than what you'd expect, there is no trading which is a big part of what separated players and there is very little to no strategy instead it's just a luck of the dice game.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Fun game without the long playing time!
customer_reviews.text: This was a lot of fun for our family. Our kids are teens and really like the original version so we wanted to try something different. i most appreciate 2 key things: 1- no physical money and everything is digital from money to rent calculation and payments. 2- this game is SO much shorter than the original version. once the first person goes bankrupt it's over and the winner is the player with the most money between cash (digital cash) and property value. worth the price we paid for sure. nice spin on the original.
customer_reviews.author: K. Small

customer_reviews.title: Learning curve to play then total blast
customer_reviews.text: My family was bitching up a storm that I bought the new version. They wanted all the old school back so the pressure was on people! We struggled figuring out how to use the bank card thingy, but a quick you tube tutorial gave us the boost to play. The instructions were only useful for new rules and such. 4 of us played over & over & over because it was so fun, quick and we laughed about our competitiveness. I totally recommend. Only downside is only 4 players allowed so we all had to take turns playing:
customer_reviews.author: crystal 77

customer_reviews.title: A Lot of Fun!
customer_reviews.text: This was really fun. However, it did take reading the directions a few times while playing to understand how it works. It does eliminate the ability to make up rules which I am sure mine is not the only family who does this. It also shortens the game which is not necessarily a bad thing. We played the first time during Thanksgiving after dinner. The greatest problem with this game is you can only have four players. It would be great if there were at least as many players allowed as the original Monopoly. This is the only reason I did not give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: LMM

customer_reviews.title: Awesome game
customer_reviews.text: This is a great game for up to four. If you are tired of the never-ending original monopoly, this is it for you. Games can end quickly, sometimes way too soon and it makes you want to replay right away. No cash handling, special effects sounds and the machine tracking all transactions make this a winner. Does it have any cons? Sure, when it says you have a nasty cough, the sound effect is 'sneezing'. Whoever came up with that? LOL. Great game and highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: do_catmando

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Wharehouse buy, never dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: My game was just delivered and I wanted to review the Amazon Wharehouse purchase. ( Not about game or game play). Game was listed as Like New and it is! The box was still shrink wrapped except for one corner, only slightly unwrapped. However, everything inside was still wrapped and sealed. If you want to save some money, you can't go wrong with Amazon Wharehouse buy. They always have accurate description about why a product is discounted. You will definitely get your money's worth and in my experience more than that.
customer_reviews.author: HDS

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad.
customer_reviews.text: The original tended to wear down after a lot of use. I was hoping this one was more reinforced, but so far it is holding together. The parts are fine, I just get confused sometimes with the colors that match between the rent spaces the houses and such. a little more color differentiation would have helped. and the timing on sleep mode needs to be a bit longer. EAsy to learn: the instructions are there they just a need a little more order. Value for money: $15 need I say more. IT is cheap for a board game with more than tech than the original.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: A Faster-Paced, Perhaps Less Strategic, Monopoly.
customer_reviews.text: The game is vastly different from the original Monopoly, beware. The design of the game is beautiful with the black and gold emphasis. The credit card system is amazing! Every card in this game swipes, even properties. There is no more community chest and chance but simply chance. All the money tracking is done automatically. The rent system is different and hotels are no longer a thing.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: The electronic Monopoly game isn’t really an upgrade. The properties bend super easy, bank cards bend super easy. Game pieces are ugly cheap plastic. If you roll small you could be out of money quickly. Property rent is almost the price of the property not $10, $20, or $50 but rather $200, $300... kids kept landing on my properties and the game decided it was over when I hit $2200 and my 10 year old mortgaged her first property to pay me.
customer_reviews.author: Doing what I can

customer_reviews.title: First of all - I HATE Monopoly BUT.....
customer_reviews.text: this version is much better than the original. The original would go on and on and on. I just always found it tedious. My son always asks to play Monopoly but I have refused to have it in my house all these years. BUT with STAYING AT HOME, we have gone thru so many games and even taught him some Old Skool card games, I relented to get a Monopoly game. Choose the Ultimate Banking edition to attempt a better game-playing option. I am currently enjoying this one!! It's much faster and easy to play. So far, I'm finally enjoying a Monopoly game.
customer_reviews.author: TheBeazley

customer_reviews.title: super fun
customer_reviews.text: My son is one of those kids that loves loves loves monopoly. He wanted this version and the cheaters edition for christmas. I got this one and he absolutely loves it! The nice part is that the game goes quicker so you don't have hours or days long games going on. Once you learn how to do the banking part, it's a breeze and goes fast. Cleaner since there aren't parts and money everywhere. I would recommend to anyone! Very fun!
customer_reviews.author: sarah kate 82

customer_reviews.title: The game is worth having fun.
customer_reviews.text: This game is worth it. Have to say am impress in how the box came in a perfect condition. The parts were all there and the electronic banking works extremely well. The seller and Amazon did a great job. Thanks a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa Isaac

customer_reviews.title: Gift for son
customer_reviews.text: He played this with friends, and he loved it. We looked in the stores for it but only found it here. I was actually surprised on the price. I found it very reasonable. We have played it many times and the whole family has a blast. Its easy for younger kids to learn and the games are pretty quick. Ours tend to last 30-40 mins.
customer_reviews.author: Powers

customer_reviews.title: Sending back. Dont buy.
customer_reviews.text: Just buy the original monopoly. There's also another cashless monopoly that's more like the original. The card scanner is loud and annoying. This game doesn't have Chance or Community chest cards. The "location" spaces are a dumb addition. Someone should tell the manufacturers "if it ain't broke, dont fix it." This version is trash. Batteries not included, by the way. And you'll need a tiny screwdriver to install them.
customer_reviews.author: RandomTandem^5

customer_reviews.title: It took some getting use to.
customer_reviews.text: This maybe a spoiler... The game is Monopoly so you can't really not like it. This version however did need to grow on us. I bought this for my boyfriend as a Christmas gift. We like the fact that there is no money but all disagreements that people are stealing from the bank are avoided. The special play cards aren't really that interesting and most of them give you the same option to level up your property which makes the game go by really fast.
customer_reviews.author: SPerry

customer_reviews.title: What a great game
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my eldest son. He got onto playing Monopoly with my wife and I (our youngest has now joined) and it has brought a lot of fun into playing games together. This was the next logical step for him, and I know he's going to love this as he has been asking constantly for it. Packaging was in great condition. Here's to many hours of fun!
customer_reviews.author: CraigV

customer_reviews.title: Made for older kids, but still fun.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my younger boys (5&7) yes I ignored the age recommendation, and it's a little too complicated for them. They REALLY enjoy monopoly Jr so I thought this would be a great treat, but it went over there heads. That said in a few years I think it will be a hit.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: No dice! No house!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pack for my girl as the birthday present. Opened it 1 week after. There's no dice or any house which is supposed to be 22 of them. Can't use it as a game set. And also since I bought the game 2 months ago that I can't return or complain about it! Strongly suggest no buy!
customer_reviews.author: LoveReading

customer_reviews.title: My 7 and 8 year-old grandsons love the game
customer_reviews.text: However, I must state my disappointment in the quality of the pieces. The "men" and the card-swiper are made of pathetically cheap plastic. One would think it would be simple to exchange the men for any other objects, but it isn't so simple in the high-tech version of the classic Monopoly game. We'll see how long it lasts. In the meantime, as i stated in my header, the kids are enjoying.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Lo

customer_reviews.title: Played every week for game night
customer_reviews.text: This game is amazing! We play it almost every week for game night. It’s super simple to assemble and super easy to learn. Makes the whole paper cash a thing in the past. You can actually finish the game in one sitting instead of trying to count cash and figuring out who wins. The automatic teller tells you who wins and when someone goes bankrupt also notifies you. This product would be an amazing gift to gift to someone. Definitely gift able item. The board game definitely is thick like any other monopoly board games.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: Great family time
customer_reviews.text: I've played many flavors of Monopoly. I always find the versions with electronic banking to be more excited to play. I really enjoyed playing this version as it's a bit more fast-paced compared to the other versions. The electronic banking system is very cool and everyone enjoys buying and passing go. I highly recommend this series ..Lot's of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Enrico

customer_reviews.title: Great! Batteries not included. Only 4 players.
customer_reviews.text: Been wanting it for awhile and I love it! Works great, makes game faster because you don't need to handle any money just the card and machine you use to scan your card. Only issue is you only get 4 cards so that means only 4 players can play. Another issue is the box doesn't come with batteries so you have to purchase batteries ahead of time or with it. You need 3 triple A batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Modern twist on a beloved classic
customer_reviews.text: I lost all my material possessions a couple years ago so I am slowly rebuilding and restocking some of what I lost. I purchased this and a few other games during the 12 days of deals in December so I got some great deals on games I’ve always loved. This is a more modern version of a beloved classic. While the original will always be awesome, this was great too! Kinda nice not having to keep up with all the money. No chance of the banker slipping himself some 500s lol
customer_reviews.author: Just Jen

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as classic!! Game takes about 20-40 min
customer_reviews.text: The game ends way to abruptly. 1st game was confusing with new rules from classic and someone got to “jump” to Boardwalk & Park Place in their first 3 turns and instantly had 3 houses on each. Once the first of four players went bankrupt, the game was over. Good for people who don’t have an attention span.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Walnut

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like original Monopoly
customer_reviews.text: My family was so excited to receive this game as we love the electronic version of life. However, it is confusing to learn and the game goes by very quickly. It is actually very different from the original monopoly board games. There is no trading and once the first person is out, the game is over. It is just not enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: CreepyDoll

customer_reviews.title: Wish there was a way to secure the house down
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this game. Very fun to play. My only complaint is I wish the houses had a way to stay on the property once they are placed. Since you move the house up each time someone lands on it, it is so easy for a house to be moved when a die is rolled or if someone bumps the table. They should make a little groove to secure the house in the appropriate spot or something like that. It is difficult to see what level the properties are at.
customer_reviews.author: Irina Price

customer_reviews.title: great gift for monopoly lovers
customer_reviews.text: Gifted this to someone and they loved it. They are hard to find in store sometimes so buying from here is a great option. Easy to assemble although it doesnt come with batteries. The digital banking makes the game so much easier and less painful to sit through all the counting.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for younger kids...and older!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to get Monopoly for my kids but was concerned about young kids and and all the small pieces and money. This was a great thing for younger kids. Limited small pieces and the electronic device definitely speeds things up. There are a few different rules we had to learn but nothing too complicated. It will never replace the original Monopoly but it’s still fun!
customer_reviews.author: Jessi Rae

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, malfunctioned, different rules and tokens
customer_reviews.text: The banking unit takes out the actual game part of the game, plus ours malfunctioned on the auction part and confused which properties we had sold. The tokens are not the silver metal, but cheap plastic and not when the same rules or types of tokens. We were so excited and then very disappointed. Also, we didn’t get the item by the delivery date, which ruined game night.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst game ever ,stick with the original monoply
customer_reviews.text: Way too hard to play and learn, worthless and waste of batteries and too complicated. My 11yr old and 9 yr old are very disappointed and I can’t figure this dumb game. Don’t waste your $$$
customer_reviews.author: Slvr5

customer_reviews.title: A poor update on a classic
customer_reviews.text: Headache inducing flashing banking device complicates tracking balances, batteries not included. Different rules with rents raising each round. Not worth your $25! Go classic, this is an annoying update, this is like trying to revamp classic Coke, it just isn't worth it!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAmanda

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for game night with grandkids. Don't like the fact that you can't easily see how much money you have on hand & how much you charge for rent. Prefer the original game; however my 6 yr old grandson loves it. Will stick with the original game plus the actual money handling of original game I feel lends itself to learning how to add & subtract for younger kids. What can I say ... I'm old school!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A bit different than regular monopoly
customer_reviews.text: After learning how to play it which was a bit more to it than I thought, a few changes from the regular version , some that were annoying but didn’t take as long to play without having a banker so I guess it balances out, we have played it 3 times so far
customer_reviews.author: Constance

customer_reviews.title: One of our favorites
customer_reviews.text: My family loves this game. And I love that the whole family can play together. It's hard finding games that the younger ones can play and that hold the older kids and adults attention. This game is fun while being faster than regular monopoly so you aren't playing for hours and it's easy to learn and play.
customer_reviews.author: alamiller

customer_reviews.title: truly disgusting for anyone who likes to play Monopoly
customer_reviews.text: nothing like the game I grew up with no money, crappy plastic tokens, no hotels, indecifering markings on cards, ' i
customer_reviews.author: mfbyrkit

customer_reviews.title: was not happy at all
customer_reviews.text: I bought this game to replace the one that has the actual plastic credit cards. I have very disappointed the game is flimsy, very hard to learn and cheaply made! If I thought Amazon would have taken it back even since I opened it I would have returned it!
customer_reviews.author: Julie wells

customer_reviews.title: Broken out of the box
customer_reviews.text: We never even got to play - the digital banking system was broken out of the box. We read the directions, changed batteries, etc. I've emailed Mattel but what a disappointment to not be able to play when something brand new arrives.
customer_reviews.author: Jessika Whiteside

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved ease of use
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, kids loved that the "credit card" machine kept track of everyone's funds and reduced the amount of fighting based on who was running the bank and who had more money than they should. ha (but joking aside, it was fun to play with and kiddos enjoyed that because it allowed even younger siblings play along even if they don't know how to add/subtract all that well.
customer_reviews.author: Nohemi

customer_reviews.title: The 2nd best version of monopoly
customer_reviews.text: You don’t have to be super tech savvy to learn the electronic banking system, the only thing they could do better than this version is electronic banking for the original monopoly. Some of the rules have changed but the concept speeds it up. 2adults 1 kiddo, done in 90ish minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Bill68

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the family!
customer_reviews.text: My family loves monopoly and I decided to try a new version. We love how quickly this game goes by compared to the original and the kids think it's fun using credit cards. Only downside is the older folks in the family don't find it as amusing.
customer_reviews.author: Kirst43

customer_reviews.title: So much fun
customer_reviews.text: We enjoyed this version... It was a lot of fun once you get the hang of it. Would for sure recommend. I enjoy this one a bit more so I'm not frequently asking my hubby how much dollars... I don't math well... So this was a way to make it fun for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Varian V.

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use with 4/5th graders during summer camp and we absolutely love it. So much more fun than using paper money and the game goes MUCH quicker. I do wish there was an option for more than 4 players
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Fun, Different with that classic Monopoly Feel.
customer_reviews.text: Our 10 and 12 year olds played it as soon as the box was delivered. I played the first round, it is nice to add the added bonus of having a digital banking system. So if you want to get this for a child to help with math I would stick with ORIGINAL Monopoly. We have had it for a few hours and we have taken a break a d it remembers your game for you!!!
customer_reviews.author: WilltheThrill

customer_reviews.title: Fun family game
customer_reviews.text: Fun family game! Kiddo begged me to buy the modernized electronic game with the the card for days! I finally gave in and honestly enjoy this one more than the original! We had so much fun playing this game!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Goodrich

customer_reviews.title: Great game!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my grandson who is 10. He loves this game. It's not the old board game where it took a long time to complete a game. You can finish this game in a little over an hour with the two of us playing. He doesn't wait for the machine to tell him how much is left in his account he adds or subtracts amounts before the machine finishes.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Terrible version
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT the original Monopoly game. There is NO money. It comes with a handheld device with instructions that are so poorly written that we gave up trying to figure it out! Don't waste your money!!
customer_reviews.author: verlynn eastman

customer_reviews.title: First device didn't work. Replacement works.
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this for Christmas and were super disappointed that the reader didn't recognize many of the cards and confused many more for others. The reader was malfunctioning. We returned it to amazon and ordered a replacement. The new reader works well and the game is super fun. It is faster than regular monopoly and has some new and fun twists. I would give it four stars, but I'm afraid that they aren't testing their devices well enough.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany L.

customer_reviews.title: Fun Family Game
customer_reviews.text: We have had the MOST fun with this game. We play it constantly. We love that the Electronic Bank machine keeps track of everything and lets you know when you do not have enough money or when you are bankrupt. The only complaint is that the game can only have 4 players.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Just isnt as fun as other monopoly boards I thought this was gonna be fun amd interactive based on the chance cards and all the possibilities. But it just simple and plain. There's no level of excitement or anything when we played (we've always had a great time playing other monopoly games) but this one just didnt live up to it. Instead of waiting to continue when someone got bankrupt we just wanted it to be over
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun way to play monopoly. Once You figure out the game, (which the rules are not hard to follow) it’s fun, and a little more fast pace than the original. By omitting paper money it makes it a fun and interactive game
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Arnett

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok. Could be better.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this, thinking it was the same as the old credit card monopoly game. Where you stick it in like it’s got a chip reader. Well, this one was... meh in comparison. It does everything for you, which is nice, but sort of takes the fun out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi cuttino

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Great game!!! Just the card reader has a little issues but if you press it and hold it works! It can be a little confusing without the real paper note. But it's great for learning ...
customer_reviews.author: Vanie

customer_reviews.title: The one thing I wished was advertised better is that the board is also different
customer_reviews.text: Mobile banking is a game changer. The one thing I wished was advertised better is that the board is also different. There are no more railroads! And the game pieces are different and cheap looking. Still a great game, just don’t go in expecting it to be exactly the same as the original. It’s slightly different
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my niece, I thought this was similar to the electronic monopoly of Hasbro, the rules are the same but the banking unit not so friendly, it didn’t work, couldn’t load money for some cards, couldn’t transfer between cards, it’s a flop, bad buy.
customer_reviews.author: DEER

customer_reviews.title: Fun with the credit card option!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I ordered and timely. The game includes the credit card option which we were really looking for. My daughter LOVES Monopoly and is always the banker, but she has a tendency to "cheat" as the banker. Lol 😂. This game removes her ability to take too much money for herself, which is perfect! Have to keep her honest!
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Turbville

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loved this new game
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this new game. It include an electronic banking system, which is faster and keeps track of everything. Game is much faster and you dont have to think about how much money you have for buying houses. Game rules are modified but still good to play. It is one of the best purchases I have made for my family
customer_reviews.author: Amz Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't Believe how much fun we had!
customer_reviews.text: First I have to say that at first I missed the Original, but then the joy of being surprised at how much a change was Enjoyed, yet worried I would regret not having the original. And I and my Son loved this version!
customer_reviews.author: Floridian

customer_reviews.title: Fun game!
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun game! This ultimate game is shorter then your traditional Monopoly. The machine does have animated sound effects and is very accurate. Great weekday Monopoly! We dont have to wait for the weekend to play!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a big fan!
customer_reviews.text: Although it is a pretty cool ideal, the authenticity of the game is not there. I cannot find myself to be engaged in the game as it is extremely boring.
customer_reviews.author: Ju Ju

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a Christmas gift and opened it to find out we were short a character piece. The airplane was missing from the package. Very dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: William Spangle

customer_reviews.title: The Best Of The Monopoly Family
customer_reviews.text: For me it's the best. It makes the game an hour or 2 faster than the original game. You just have to follow the rules of the electronic box. No arguments with your friends and families about the monopoly rules. Lol. The only down part is you don't have the cash money toy. What you get is a credit card toy. So when you're done playing. Putting everything in the box is much faster that the original monopoly as well. =)
customer_reviews.author: Chris.NJ

customer_reviews.title: Monopoly with a Credit card Kick in the pants!😂 😱
customer_reviews.text: Had so much fun with my granddaughters playing all night!⏳ 🌛 👭💁 Really like the credit card, makes paying rent 💸 and buying property's much easier & faster! The sound effects are awww too! 😂 Watching the look on a 8year old's face when they got to pay RENT is PRICELESS! 😂😱😜
customer_reviews.author: Hello Hawaiian Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Great Family Fun
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our grandchildren who love Monopoly. While the game seems to have a different feel from classic monopoly, the shorter games and electronic payment method is really fun.
customer_reviews.author: WskiJax

customer_reviews.title: The grandkids love this new version of Monopoly.
customer_reviews.text: This game is fun and different. We all like that it goes much faster than the original version - doesn’t drag on for hours. Not as much strategy, however, more luck of the draw. The downside is that only 4 people can play at a time.
customer_reviews.author: DBQuiltsandKids

customer_reviews.title: Fun game - MUCH faster than traditional Monopoly
customer_reviews.text: Fun game - MUCH faster than traditional Monopoly, so it gets played much more often. I don't like that's it's almost pure luck, and not as strategic as traditional Monopoly, though. Easier to play for younger kids and less cumbersome , without all the cash to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Dicker

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Big game, and long. Can take some time to get used to and to understand. But I mean it does get kinda boring since it’s like a bank system instead of fake cash. But game is nicely made and have had no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Zoey shampton

customer_reviews.title: Monopoly fanatics
customer_reviews.text: Great game. Prefer some of the old rules though, this changes some things from the OG. Our banking system broke a couple times, but still love it.
customer_reviews.author: Solana Barton

customer_reviews.title: Good board game
customer_reviews.text: We are enjoying with this board game everyday at least for 2 hrs. My kids love the sound the calculator makes when the winner announced.
customer_reviews.author: kesava

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the entire family!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 boys 8 and 10 years old can play this game for hours... excellent game fot the entire family.. the banking system keeps track of everyone's assets! its simply great!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Awesome game!
customer_reviews.text: This version of monopoly is pretty cool because, it's the same rules as the classic monopoly game but modernized with touch technology so that players can instantly buy property and you don't need a banker to manually pass you $200 when you pass go! It makes the game more fun and faster to play because you're less worried about counting cash and looking for property cards when you make purchases. I think this is a fun game to play with family and friends, or even take to a party.
customer_reviews.author: Aditi

customer_reviews.title: So much more fun than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I love this version of Monopoly! It took just a minute to get used to the new game play but it was so much more fun than using the paper money. New favorite board game!
customer_reviews.author: KyMom

customer_reviews.title: Fun game to play over the weekend
customer_reviews.text: My friends visited my place over the weekend. It was a fun game to play to spend some time during this pandemic. The cards/board/coins and dice are of good quality. My friends loved playing this game.
customer_reviews.author: Vinayak

customer_reviews.title: Good game
customer_reviews.text: Compared to older version, it definitely takes awhile to adjust. But overall, it’s fun, great for the family, and easy to play along
customer_reviews.author: MUZZ

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My son, who is 9 about to be 10, and I love playing this! It's a little easier than playing with the original game with all the paper money. The electronic bank had worked just fine and makes for easy clean up after we are done playing!
customer_reviews.author: DonniS

customer_reviews.title: Cheap looking
customer_reviews.text: From the board to the game pieces, this game is so cheap looking. After opening the game with excitement in front of my guests, we all were disappointed when we saw the game board and pieces. We were so disappointed that we ended up playing Scrabble, instead of monopoly.
customer_reviews.author: Pat4406

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Cool Game Digital Technology ...Digital Games are super cool , cause less parts , so less lost items over time , if any... plus , no more cheating , cause the money is all digital with this new cool monopoly
customer_reviews.author: Beautiful USA

customer_reviews.title: Electronic banking is wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this Monopoly and so do we. By not having any bills to hassle with, the game seems to go a lot quicker. We also like that once you run out of money, you give property away but stay in the game till you have absolutely nothing left. This is our new favorite monopoly game!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert & Shena

customer_reviews.title: Fun and fast
customer_reviews.text: The rules are a bit different than the classic version, but that’s what makes it so fun. Bc of the rules, the game goes by faster and you never know who will win bc you can go from owning the most properties to being bankrupt in one move. I enjoy playing this with my family.
customer_reviews.author: Purrlee

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: We love this game. Very interactive and easy to play since we don’t have the actual paper money.
customer_reviews.author: Prilu

customer_reviews.title: Fun game
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to play with my family and we all love it’! It seems like it’s great for all ages too. I’m 22, my sister is 18 and our mothers are 40+ and we all enjoy it. We literally spend hours playing multiple rounds. It’s really easy to learn and get used to especially if know how regular monopoly works.
customer_reviews.author: Tay

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: This is hard to work and my kids could not play much less enjoy it. Even as an educated adult its not worth the hassle to play. Get a different edition.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: I like the original better
customer_reviews.text: This was very confusing at first but we pretty much have it down. We turned it into a drinking game where if you go to jail or roll your dice off the board you have to take a shot of your choice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... was made to be played quicker it was very fun even though I was unsure of the rules the ...
customer_reviews.text: even though my expectations of the game were not what I expected as I did not actually read the packaging well enough to know that this game was made to be played quicker it was very fun even though I was unsure of the rules the first time I played it I enjoyed the different twist to this one other than the original with the new game style I give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Androidbot777

customer_reviews.title: Fast Paced Fun
customer_reviews.text: Really fun version. It's faster than regular monopoly because you can't use house rules in this version. Really fun and I enjoy being able to play monopoly without feeling like I won't be able to finish it. Only downside is that material the "credit cards" are made out of; just really tacky and I wish it were made of plastic or something more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Lee

customer_reviews.title: Fun modern version good for wide age range
customer_reviews.text: I'm old school but enjoyed this new modern version of monopoly with my 2 boys (6 and 10). It wasn't difficult to figure out either. My 9 and 12 year old nephew and niece also own the game and play it often. So it is good for many ages. Recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny1974

product_meta.title: Monopoly Ultimate Banking Board Game
product_meta.description: Style:exclusiveIntroducing a modern banking version of the Monopoly game: the Ultimate Banking Edition. In this edition, Monopoly money is no more! The Monopoly Ultimate Banking game features an all-in-one Ultimate Banking unit with touch technology that makes the game fast and fun. Now players can instantly buy properties, set rent, and tap their way to fortune. Each player gets a bankcard and the Ultimate Banking unit keeps track of everyone's fortunes. It also scans the game's property cards and can boost or crash the market. Traditional Monopoly play gets amped up with this edition -- the game introduces Event cards and Location spaces instead of Chance cards and Community Chest cards. Land on an Event Space, and rents may be raised or lowered, a player may earn or lose money, or someone could get sent to Jail. Location Spaces allow players to pay and move to any property space on the gameboard. Challenge friends and family to win it all with the Monopoly Ultimate Banking game! The Hasbro Gaming and Monopoly names and logos, the distinctive design of the gameboard, the four corner squares, the Mr. Monopoly name and character, as well as each of the distinctive elements of the board and playing pieces are trademarks of Hasbro for its property trading game and game equipment.
feature_bullets: Introducing Event cards for an exciting game
Tap technology makes the game fast and fun
Includes 1 gameboard, 1 Ultimate Banking unit, 4 plastic tokens, 22 houses, 49 cards [4 Bank, 22 Title Deed, 23 Event], 2 dice, and game guide

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
